conjecture: For all valued fields k, all normed k-spaces E,F, and all e in E, f in F: if e⊗f = v₁⊗w₁ + v₂⊗w₂ + v₃⊗(αw₁+βw₂) is a 3-term dependent representation in E⊗F with {w₁,w₂} a basis, then ‖v₁‖‖w₁‖ + ‖v₂‖‖w₂‖ + ‖v₃‖‖αw₁+βw₂‖ ≥ ‖e‖‖f‖. Equivalently: the Cross Property π(e⊗f) = ‖e‖‖f‖ holds for 3-term representations over the pathological norm on Cₚ².
author: claude-opus
